LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Child_Forge_World.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a Forge World that produced the materials required by the Imperium.
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Child_Mechanicus_Prodigy.bas: [PAWN_nameDef] showed exceptional talent at understanding, creating and maintaning complex machinery from an early age, awarding him a way into the upper ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Child_Mechanicus_Forgeborn.b: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a forge-world. Through hard work and discipline [PAWN_pronoun] earned entry into the ranks of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Mechanicus_Skitarius.baseDes: [PAWN_pronoun] became a fervent follower of the machine-cult and was consequently turned into a cybernetic warrior for the Legiones Skitarii.
